name: The Uncontrollable Urge to Gabagool
description:
Imagine... Your roommate is watching Sopranos. You stumble in, bleary eyed. Oh, you know this show! Well, you don't KNOW know it. Like, you haven't watched it. But you get it! You totally get it. Ohhhh, marone, I'm a mobsta! Tony Soprano! Yeah, you get it.

Can you get through a scene of the universally acclaimed HBO show without letting your intrusive thoughts win?

* * *

(Once you're in the main scene)

Press Tab to reload main scene.

Press 1 to reload from theme song.

* * *

Thank you to Christian Della Donna (@deldon) for their vocal talents, and expertise as an Italian-American whose family works in waste disposal. Thanks to Lee (@MxGrrr) for the coding help. Thanks to my mom for watching Sopranos with me.

Made for Prototype Studio at the NYU Game Center, based on the prompt "a game you'd rather watch than play".
